description:
Stroll, cycle and live your life, showing young family members all your favourite things. Equipped as both a bike trailer and a stroller, the Chariot Sport is ready for active parents. Powerful disc brakes ensure make it easier to stroll on steep terrain. Thule’s intuitive rail system makes attaching and adjusting covers and screens as simple as clicking them in place. Mesh panels and adjustable front vents keep your passenger cool and comfortable on hot days. With conversion kits (available separately) you can take your chariot jogging, cross-country skiing or hiking. So, get out and enjoy nature as a family.

  • UV-protected, tinted side windows for passenger safety and comfort
  • Windows are removeable for improved airflow
  • Easy-to-use attachment system for bug screen, rain cover and sunshade
  • Click n’ Store™ compartment stashes toys, diapers and snacks and it tucks out of the way when not in use
  • Plenty of onboard storage
  • Large rear cargo compartment folds out of the way when not needed, giving you more room to move
  • Hitch arm stores on the frame for fast switches from strolling to cycling
  • Front wheels store on the VersaWing™ bracket when not in use to convert from trailer to stroller
  • Narrow, aerodynamic profile
  • 5-point padded harness for safety and comfort
  • Reclining seat can be activated with 1 hand and helps your little passenger catch some Zs
  • Padded seatback is removeable for easy cleaning and has a supportive headrest that can be folded down when your passengers are wearing helmets
  • Disc brakes are controlled on the handlebar and provide improved speed control on hills
  • Adjustable handlebar has 4 different positions for different parents and activities
  • Rear suspension smooths the ride and is adjustable for different terrain
  • Safety wrist strap prevents a run-away
  • Large rear wheels roll easily over uneven terrain; front stroller wheels provide easy turning
  • VersaWing™ and ezClick™ tech easily install conversion kits (cycling trailer kit included, all other kits sold separately)
  • Push button folding design for storage or transport
  • Trailer kit snaps quickly into place without tools
  • Rear light and reflectors help keep you and your little passenger seen
  • When used as a trailer, do not use with children under 6 months of age and do not exceed 25km/h
  • Folded dimensions: 87 x 65 x 37.5cm
name: Thule Chariot Sport Single Trailer
